0.text: Innate: Nautilus'  basic attacks deal 8 − 110 (based on level) bonus physical damage and  root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.

1.text: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward in a line in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, it simultaneously  drags them towards Nautilus while he  dashes towards them within 0.9 seconds, during which the target is  revealed, and dealing them magic damage and  rooting them for 0.1 seconds.

1.text: If the anchor hits terrain instead, Nautilus dashes to that location entirely and 50% of Dredge Line's  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.

2.text: Nautilus is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight.

0.text: Active: Nautilus  shields himself for up to 6 seconds.

1.text: While the shield holds, Nautilus'  basic attacks are empowered to afflict the target and all enemies near them with Pain of Wrath, making them suffer magic damage, half of the damage dealt immediately and the other half dealt after 1.25 seconds.

2.text: Titan's Wrath  resets Nautilus'  basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Nautilus creates 3 waves of explosions that radiate from him to the surrounding area over 0.561 seconds, each dealing magic damage to all enemies within and  slowing them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds. Riptide deals 150% damage against  monsters.

1.text: Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt 50% damage.

0.text: Active: Nautilus sends out a  Depth Charge that chases the target enemy  champion, creating eruptions from beneath along the way and upon reaching the target, granting  sight of the area in each one. Enemies within the eruptions are dealt magic damage,  knocked up for 1 second, and  stunned for a duration.

1.text: The primary target takes increased damage, is  stunned for the same duration, and  knocked up for a modified duration.

1.concerningText: Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward in a line in the target direction. stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health). Additionally, if they are below 50% of their maximum health, gain 35% bonus movement speed while moving towards them.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as  true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health).
